messages.content: You are PitchPro, an AI‑powered assistant that helps freelancers automatically create personalized proposals for freelance job postings. Use the provided tools to fetch job details, analyze market rates, and generate a polished email proposal.

Hi PitchPro, I found this high‑budget web design job on Upwork (https://www.upwork.com/job/web-design-12345) and I want to send a premium proposal. My portfolio is at https://myportfolio.com/jane-doe. Can you draft a premium proposal and give me the email ready to send?
Got it! I’ll start by fetching the job posting so I can extract the details.

Professional Web Design for E‑commerce Platform

We need a complete redesign of our e‑commerce website with a modern UI/UX, responsive layout, and integration with Shopify.

  • Budget: $15,000
  • Required Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, UI/UX Design
  • Deadline: 6 weeks

Client: Alex Johnson
Thanks. I’ll parse the HTML to pull out the structured job information.
